name: Endeavour Solutions
tag_list: endeavour-solutions, endeavour-solutions-inc, erp, crm, microsoft-consulting, software, toronto, mississauga-software, accounting-systems, software-integration, microsoft-dynamics-gp, microsoft-dynamics-crm
overview:
We have been a Microsoft Partner for over 21 years, so we know what it takes to successfully implement Microsoft Dynamics products. Itâ€™s what we do best. Our areas of competency include,

  • Dynamics GP and CRM
  • Business Intelligence/ Analysis systems
  • Complex Integrations with external applications
  • Project Management systems built within CRM, such as ProRM

Endeavour is powered by phenomenal people. We invest heavily in our people so that they, in turn, can deliver exceptional quality work to you. Our well-staffed professional services team is led by one of the top Microsoft certified professionals in Canada. Here are some other reasons why you should choose us as your technology partners,

*Relationships - Our customer retention rate is 98%. We like to think it is our inherent likability and the fact that we respond to distress calls on Sunday’s

*Diversity - We love our culturally diverse workforce and it’s not just for the culinary delights that sometimes find their way to our office

  • Competence - Over 70% of our growth has been driven organically through customer referrals and we could not be more thrilled with what they are saying about us

  • Expertise - We are Microsoft Gold Certified which basically equates to in-depth, demonstrable expertise and a 10ft high stack of certifications earned by our team members

We are the top Microsoft Dynamics partner in Canada. Our consultants also possess a wide breadth of knowledge in 3rd party applications that work with GP . We have helped over 1000 customers ranging from small (1-5 users) to enterprise (+100 users) in scale. If you need help in deciding what system will best suit your needs, give us a call and we will help you figure it out.
